name: The Old Town Dreams
description:
Alice has enrolled at the University of Greamlinn and comes a month in advance to explore the city. Her granny Milda lives in the Old Town, the most mysterious part of Greamlinn full of legends and weird stories. But are these legends really just fiction? And if it’s so, why do more and more unexplainable strange things happen

"I’m Alice, I’m eighteen and I’m ready to explore all the oddities and weirdness I discover. I want to meet new people, explore the city, make new friends and maybe even fall in love. And if the Old Town really can give magical powers I don’t mind to test this out myself.

Would you like to visit Greamlinn with me? "

If you do, you can either:

- play the game right here in your browser, by pressing the button above this text

or

- download the visual novel THE OLD TOWN DREAMS using the link below (for Windows, Linux or Mac).

Currently the game is in progress, but a significant part is done, so it is playable and long enough to immerse you in the atmosphere!
